name: Dev - Laravel & Next.js
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y zip unzip git htop poppler-utils mariadb-server mariadb-client && echo 'extension=imagick.so' >> /opt/bitnami/php/etc/php.ini && service mariadb start && mysql -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS laravel;' && mysql -e "CREATE USER 'laravel'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'laravel'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;"

postAttachCommand.GitSession: git config user.name 'ivanmdh' && git config user.email 'ivan@infocus.mx' && git config commit.gpgsign false
postAttachCommand.Hosts: echo '127.0.0.1 eog.local' >> /etc/hosts && echo '127.0.0.1 api.eog.local' >> /etc/hosts && echo '127.0.0.1 static.eog.local' >> /etc/hosts
postAttachCommand.eogBE: cd /workspaces/eog/eogBE/ && composer update && php artisan migrate --seed && php artisan serve
postAttachCommand.eogFE: cd /workspaces/eog/eogFE/ && npm install && npx next dev
